com.microsoft.azure.storage

Class StorageKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.storage.StorageKey
  • Deprecated. 
    as of 3.0.0. Please use the methods on StorageCredentialsAccountAndKey.

    @Deprecated
public final class StorageKey
extends Object
    Represents a container for a storage key.

    • Method Detail

      • computeMacSha256

        public static String computeMacSha256(StorageKey storageKey,
                      String stringToSign)
                               throws InvalidKeyException
        Deprecated. 
        Computes a signature for the specified string using the HMAC-SHA256 algorithm.
        Parameters:
        storageKey - A StorageKey object that represents the storage key to use.
        stringToSign - The UTF-8-encoded string to sign.
        Returns:
        A String that contains the HMAC-SHA256-encoded signature.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the string to sign is not a valid Base64-encoded string.
        InvalidKeyException - If the key is not a valid storage key.

      • computeMacSha512

        public static String computeMacSha512(StorageKey storageKey,
                      String stringToSign)
                               throws InvalidKeyException
        Deprecated. 
        Computes a signature for the specified string using the HMAC-SHA512 algorithm.
        Parameters:
        storageKey - A StorageKey object that represents the storage key to use.
        stringToSign - The UTF-8-encoded string to sign.
        Returns:
        A String that contains the HMAC-SHA512-encoded signature.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the string to sign is not a valid Base64-encoded string.
        InvalidKeyException - If the key is not a valid storage key.

      • getBase64EncodedKey

        public String getBase64EncodedKey()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the Base64-encoded key.
        Returns:
        A String that represents the Base64-encoded key.

      • getKey

        public byte[] getKey()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the key.
        Returns:
        A byte array that represents the key.

      • setKey

        public void setKey(byte[] key)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the key to be used, using the specified byte array as the key.

        This method is provided to support key rotation. This method is not thread-safe.

        Parameters:
        key - A byte array that represents the key being assigned.

      • setKey

        public void setKey(String key)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the key to be used, using the specified String as the key.

        This method is provided to support key rotation. This method is not thread-safe.

        Parameters:
        key - A String that represents the key being assigned.
